name: Dry Dry Desert
description:
Made in 2018 for GM48 game jam

You have been left alone in the dangerous desert. you are very thirsty, you must find something to drink. but where do you find a drink in the middle of the desert? You must drink the blood of your enemies, or your own if necessary. Drag yourself through the desert in your quest to survive.

CONTROLS:

Use your MOUSE to point your arms, then use SPACE to pull yourself in that direction.

Use “F” to attack towards the direction of your mouse.

Use “E” to drink when you are touching a liquid.

Use “G” to enter Berserk mode, be careful when in berserk mode your water drains a lot faster

CREDITS:

I made everything myself besides the music

Carl Orff Carmina Burana – O Fortuna. (Has not been altered) Artist: UC Davis University Chorus https://www.orangefreesounds.com/carl-orff-carmina-burana/ Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 Unported (CC BY-NC-ND 3.0)“

This used to be a city Author: yd https://opengameart.org/content/this-used-to-be-a-city

(and I stole the title from the Mario Kart track)
